Package stars

Class StarsMail

java.lang.Object
stars.StarsMail
All Implemented Interfaces:
StarsNotifier
public class StarsMail
extends java.lang.Object
implements StarsNotifier
Implementation of StarsNotifier that provides functionality of sending email through the MySTARS system.
Since:
11/11/2020
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Lai Ming Hui

    • StarsMail

    • StarsMail

      private StarsMail​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String email)
      Creates an instance of this object using the specified username, password and email.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the account associated with specified email.
      password - The password of the account associated with the specified email
      email - The email that will be used to send the notifications from.

  • Method Details

    • getSenderEmail

      Returns:
      The email set to send notifications from.

    • initializeProperties

      private void initializeProperties()
      Initializes this email notifier.

    • initSession

      private void initSession()
      Begins a session using the credentials and email set within this notifier

    • sendNotification

      public void sendNotification​(java.lang.String subject, java.lang.String messageText, java.lang.String mainRecipient, java.lang.String... otherRecipients)
      Sends an email notification containing the specified subject text and message text to the main recipient. If there are any recipients provided in otherRecipinets, they will be in the CC list of the email.
      Specified by:
      sendNotification in interface StarsNotifier
      Parameters:
      subject - The subject text of the email.
      messageText - The message to be sent in the email
      mainRecipient - The email of the main receiver of the email.
      otherRecipients - Any recipient email passed to this parameter will be in the CC list of the email.

    • sendMessage

      private void sendMessage​(java.lang.String subject, java.lang.String messageText, java.lang.String mainRecipient, java.lang.String... otherRecipients) throws javax.mail.internet.AddressException, javax.mail.MessagingException
      Sends an email containing the specified subject text and message text to the main recipient. If there are any recipients provided in otherRecipinets, they will be in the CC list of the email.
      Parameters:
      subject - The subject text.
      messageText - THe message text.
      mainRecipient - Email of the main recipient of the email.
      otherRecipients - Email to be put in the CC list of the email.
      Throws:
      javax.mail.internet.AddressException - Thrown when there is an address exception
      javax.mail.MessagingException - Thrown when there is a messaging exception.
